author: larryi
msg: Update to use Tomcat 3.2 server.xml as the template.
Now assumes Tomcat is unzipped to the root of C drive,
i.e. c:\jakarta-tomcat.  Also, the jni_connect.dll is assumed to be in the
win32\i386 directory under Tomcat's bin directory.  This matches where it is
found relative to the directory where the Tomcat binary distribution is found.

author: larryi
msg: Update to be more relavent to Tomcat 3.2.  For example, using jaxp.jar and
parser.jar instead of xml.jar, and using the logs directory.
Modified default settings for location of JDK and Tomcat.  Now assumes
JDK is installed in the default location, for example c:\jdk1.2.2, and Tomcat
is unzipped to the root of the same drive, i.e. c:\jakarta-tomcat.

author: nacho
msg: Include anonymous classes derived from Main

author: larryi
msg: Add issue about URL's being case sensitive as of Tomcat 3.2

author: nacho
msg: Dynamical loading of jars for java -jar execution, every jar
